title: Frontend Developer
jobDescription:
Job Title: Django Backend Developer

[Apply only if you have a strong hands-on practice with Django.]

Company Overview:

xScientist is a dynamic software and game development company based in India. Our primary mission is to empower entrepraeneurs, engineers, and scientists to transform their innovative ideas into reality. We specialize in leveraging cutting-edge technologies to deliver top-notch products and solutions. With a dedicated team of professionals, we offer a collaborative platform for individuals worldwide to participate in rapid product development. At xScientist, we are committed to excellence, utilizing the latest methodologies to ensure optimal results for our clients.

Roles and Responsibilities:

- Assume full ownership of projects and features developed in-house.

- Thoroughly understand client requirements and ensure accurate implementation.

- Engage in multitasking to manage various project aspects effectively.

- Demonstrate unwavering dedication to assigned tasks.

Requirements:

- Proficiency in Django & Django Rest Framework with proven project experience.

- Strong understanding of API and REST API development, including designing, building, and consuming APIs.

- Thorough understanding of Django models and ORM queries, with the ability to optimize database performance and execute complex queries.

- Comprehensive knowledge of MySQL and PostgreSQL connections with Django, along with proficiency in SQL queries and database management.

- Proficiency in Django function-based and class-based views, URL routers, serializers, and other key components of the Django framework.

- Experience with version control systems, particularly Git, and familiarity with GitHub CI/CD processes.

- Experience with Selenium/Beautiful Soup for web scraping.

- Excellent communication skills and ability to work collaboratively within a team.

- Flexibility to adapt to evolving project requirements.

- Preference will be given to candidates with on-site availability, although exceptional remote candidates with extensive Django experience will be considered.

Mode of Work:

Preference will be given to candidates willing to work on-site, but exceptional remote candidates with a strong Django background will be considered.

Hiring Process:

1. Technical Round

2. HR Round

3. Discussion with Founders

Role Out:

Upon successful completion of the interview process, selected candidates will be offered a paid internship for the first month. Based on performance evaluation during the internship period, a full-time employment offer will be extended.

Benefits:

- Opportunity to work with a diverse tech stack in a core data science startup environment.

- Stakeholder benefits in our in-house projects.

- Rapid career advancement and salary hikes based on performance.

Join us at xScientist and be part of a dynamic team dedicated to pushing the boundaries of technology and innovation!
